Package it.polimi.ingsw.helpers.builders

Class FunctionBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.helpers.builders.FunctionBuilder
public class FunctionBuilder extends Object
A builder class to create a function that calculates objectives score and goldCard points
